Window.onTouchDown

Function/Meaning
Screen touched
Type
Event of the Window class
Syntax
onTouchDown(x, y, cx, cy, id)
Arguments
x The x-coordinate of the touched position (in client coordinates).
y The y-coordinate of the touched position (in client coordinates).
cx The horizontal pixel count of the finger contact area.
Always 1 if the device does not support this.
cy The vertical pixel count of the finger contact area.
Always 1 if the device does not support this.
id Touch ID.
During multi-touch, a unique value is set for each position, allowing identification of the position by this ID.
Description
Occurs when the touch panel is touched.
